name: LD31 Horde Mode(s) Post-Dare Patch
description:
Post-Dare patch with some tweaks and suggestions.

Controls are WASD to move, and mouse to shoot.

Enter each room and hit the buttons. Survive.


Big thanks to HorrorPen over at OpenGameArt for making the music I used. Here is the link to their stuff: http://opengameart.org/users/horrorpen
